message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV 

This paper is about optimizing text representations for machine learning tasks in natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which focuses on NLP and related topics. The paper also uses machine learning techniques, so cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses optimization methods, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also deals with information retrieval (IR) and classification tasks, which could place it in cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.CV (Computer Vision) sub-categories.
